title: The Eminence in The Dungeon
text: Thee has't kicked the bucket.  A genius - harb'ring the knowledge off all martial arts known (and enshielf pow'rs) to sir. Thus, the gods - did impress with thy achievement
has't f'rsaken thy soul and award'd thee anoth'r chance at life in anoth'r w'rld, allowing thee to keepeth all of the knowledge thee did collect.
facing unfamiliar environment and challenges thee setteth out to a new journey!

buttons.text: Defy the gods and Stayeth dead
